name: Black Hole Son
description:
Controls:

Another game, made with the extraterrestrial pocket-platformer from l0bster !

Alfred, the little black hole, leaves his loving parents Gloria and Dick. It's time to grow up, so he starts his journey around the universe. To grow up he needs his favourite meal: little stars. 

So Alfred Holes mission is becoming the biggest hole in universe and wash away the rain. A black hole so big, everything will get sucked in. Bigger than the sun. Even bigger than Elon Musks ego! But unfortunately every black hole has it's weakness...

This game features

  • A baby black hole with kawaii eyes
  • Incredible sucking action - better than Kirby!
  • Pretty cool music
  • Hyperrealistic graphics
  • Alien Hot-Dogs
